meanings.definition: A scientist who studies the nervous system, especially the brain.
meanings.sent1: The neuroscientist conducted experiments to understand how the brain works.
meanings.sent2: The neuroscientist presented their research findings at the conference.
meanings.sent3: The neuroscientist accidentally spilled coffee on their lab coat while studying brain cells.
meanings.sent4: The neuroscientist's mind was a map of interconnected neurons, guiding their research.
meanings.sent5: The neuroscientist's passion for unraveling the mysteries of the brain was evident in every experiment.

meanings.definition: One who specializes in the scientific study of the nervous system and its functions.
meanings.sent1: As a neuroscientist, she focused on understanding how the nervous system controls movement.
meanings.sent2: The neuroscientist's lab was equipped with advanced technology for brain imaging.
meanings.sent3: The neuroscientist joked that studying the brain sometimes made their own head hurt.
meanings.sent4: Her curiosity as a neuroscientist was a never-ending journey through the complexities of the nervous system.
meanings.sent5: The neuroscientist's dedication to unraveling the secrets of the nervous system was unwavering.
